thread.title: Citigroup Part of Regulators' Investigation Into Student Loans
thread.title_full: Citigroup Part of Regulators' Investigation Into Student Loans

title: Citigroup Part of Regulators' Investigation Into Student Loans
text:
Citigroup Part of Regulators’ Investigation Into Student Loans Investigation believed to be part of Consumer Financial Protection Bureau’s broader probe By Aug. 3, 2015 9:10 a.m. ET 
Citigroup Inc. said Monday that regulators are looking into its practices around servicing student loans. 
The bank didn’t say which regulator was behind the investigation, but it is believed to be part of the Consumer Financial Protection Bureau’s broader probe into financial institutions that service student loans, according to a person... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In Popular on WSJ
